segments.text: I'm looking into this kitchen scene, it's quite detailed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The perspective is a bit angled, showing the sink area first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is standing right in front of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is entirely fixed on that plate, I can tell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink is absolutely overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already submerged in the water, yet she shows no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so completely unaware of this happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a significant amount of water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This can't end well for the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really worried about her slipping.
segments.speaker: PAR
